Title: Legalizes, validates, ratifies and confirms the actions of the Huntington union free school district regardless of the failure of such district to timely file final building cost reports
Summary: Legalizes, validates, ratifies and confirms the actions of the Huntington union free school district regardless of the failure of such district to timely file final building cost reports.
ActClause: AN ACT to legalize, validate, ratify and confirm the actions of the Huntington union free school district notwithstanding the failure to timely file final building cost reports with the education department
